TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISoapServerVRoot

Docs.summary: Publishes authenticated, encrypted SOAP virtual roots on servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks See <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapServerVRoot> for the default implementation.
<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ISoapServerVRoot> is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateVirtualRootEx (string rootWebServer, string inBaseUrl, string inVirtualRoot, string homePage, string discoFile, string secureSockets, string authentication, string operation, out string baseUrl, out string virtualRoot, out string physicalPath);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateVirtualRootEx(string rootWebServer, string inBaseUrl, string inVirtualRoot, string homePage, string discoFile, string secureSockets, string authentication, string operation, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot, string physicalPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The root Web server.
The base URL that contains the virtual root.
The name of the virtual root.
if the property is to be set; otherwise, .
if a default discovery file is to be created; if there is to be no discovery file. If and a Default.disco file exists, the file is deleted.
if SSL encryption is required; otherwise, .
Specify "anonymous" if no authentication is to be used (anonymous user). Otherwise, specify an empty string.
Not used. Specify for this parameter.
When this method returns, this parameter contains the base URL.
When this method returns, this parameter contains the name of the virtual root.
When this method returns, this parameter contains the disk address of the Virtual Root directory.
Docs.summary: Creates a SOAP virtual root with security options.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteVirtualRootEx (string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteVirtualRootEx(string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot) cil managed

Docs.param: The root Web server.
The base URL that contains the virtual root.
The name of the virtual root.
Docs.summary: Deletes a virtual root. Not fully implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The functionality to delete a virtual root is not currently available in the implementation of this interface. The implementation returns without deleting the root.

Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.
The call to identify the system directory failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetVirtualRootStatus (string rootWebServer, string inBaseUrl, string inVirtualRoot, out string exists, out string secureSockets, out string windowsAuth, out string anonymous, out string homePage, out string discoFile, out string physicalPath, out string baseUrl, out string virtualRoot);

The name of the virtual root.
When this method returns, this parameter contains a if the virtual directory exists; otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains a if SSL encryption is required; otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains if Windows authentication is set, otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains if no authentication is set (anonymous user); otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains a if the Virtual Root directory's property is set; otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains a if a Default.disco file exists; otherwise, .
When this method returns, this parameter contains the disk address of the Virtual Root directory.
When this method returns, this parameter contains the base URL.
When this method returns, this parameter contains the name of the virtual root.
Docs.summary: Returns the security status of an existing SOAP virtual root.
